SEARCH
Package io.brane.core.tx

Record Class LegacyTransaction

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
io.brane.core.tx.LegacyTransaction
Record Components:
nonce - the transaction nonce
gasPrice - the gas price in wei
gasLimit - the maximum gas to use
to - the recipient address (null for contract creation)
value - the amount of ether to send
data - the transaction data (calldata or contract bytecode)
All Implemented Interfaces:
UnsignedTransaction
public record LegacyTransaction(long nonce, Wei gasPrice, long gasLimit, Address to, Wei value, HexData data) extends Record implements UnsignedTransaction
EIP-155 legacy transaction with gasPrice.

This transaction type uses the traditional gas pricing model with a single gasPrice field. The signature includes chain ID protection per EIP-155.

EIP-155 Encoding

Signing preimage: RLP([nonce, gasPrice, gasLimit, to, value, data, chainId, 0, 0])
Signed envelope: RLP([nonce, gasPrice, gasLimit, to, value, data, v, r, s])
where v = chainId * 2 + 35 + yParity

Usage Example


 LegacyTransaction tx = new LegacyTransaction(
         0L, // nonce
         Wei.gwei(20), // gasPrice
         21000L, // gasLimit
         Address.fromHex("0x..."), // to
         Wei.ether("0.1"), // value
         HexData.EMPTY // data
 );
 
 byte[] preimage = tx.encodeForSigning(1); // chainId = 1 (mainnet)
 Signature sig = privateKey.sign(Keccak256.hash(preimage));
 byte[] envelope = tx.encodeAsEnvelope(sig);
Since:
0.2.0

  • Method Details

    • encodeForSigning

      public byte[] encodeForSigning(long chainId)
      Description copied from interface: UnsignedTransaction
      Encodes the transaction for signing (pre-signature RLP encoding).

      For EIP-155 (legacy): RLP([nonce, gasPrice, gasLimit, to, value, data, chainId, 0, 0])
      For EIP-1559: 0x02 || RLP([chainId, nonce, maxPriorityFee, maxFee, gasLimit, to, value, data, accessList])

      Specified by:
      encodeForSigning in interface UnsignedTransaction
      Parameters:
      chainId - the chain ID for EIP-155 encoding
      Returns:
      bytes to hash and sign

    • encodeAsEnvelope

      public byte[] encodeAsEnvelope(Signature signature)
      Description copied from interface: UnsignedTransaction
      Encodes the signed transaction as a network-ready envelope.

      For EIP-155 (legacy): RLP([nonce, gasPrice, gasLimit, to, value, data, v, r, s])
      For EIP-1559: 0x02 || RLP([chainId, nonce, maxPriorityFee, maxFee, gasLimit, to, value, data, accessList, yParity, r, s])

      Specified by:
      encodeAsEnvelope in interface UnsignedTransaction
      Parameters:
      signature - the signature to include
      Returns:
      bytes ready for eth_sendRawTransaction
